labels.value: Verify that the user is able to get an error message when username (with special characters other than @) in the username field in the Register page is entered

name: Verify that the user is able to get an error message when username (with special characters other than @) in the username field in the Register page is entered

steps.name: Given User is in the Register page after clicking Register link in the home page
When User enters invalid data from excel sheet 'Register' and 5 for the username field
Then User should be able to get error message for username in the Register page
